COSIE.downstream_analysis.visualize_global_cluster_centroid_dendrogram¶

visualize_global_cluster_centroid_dendrogram(final_embeddings, cluster_label)[source]¶

Visualize dendrogram for clusters shared across sections.

Parameters¶

final_embeddingsdict

Section-wise cell embeddings.

cluster_labeldict

Section-wise cluster label arrays (joint clustering).

Returns¶

None
